EmailTemplate.subject: Verbal lease extension documents for (CUSTOMER NAME)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Lessee,

Thank you for allowing Honda Financial Services the opportunity to further accommodate your financing needs. Your lease extension has been processed and your payments will continue to be withdrawn on your regular payment due date. Please note that any missed payments on the account have been debited so please ensure funds are available.

Along with extending your lease, we are pleased to inform you that we have also extended your loyalty offers; you will continue to qualify for your 1% rate reduction on the purchase or lease of your next new Honda.

Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this extension or any our promotions and loyalty offers, please contact Renewal and Maturity at 1-800-387-5399 ext. 7528 or by e-mail crc@ch.honda.com or your local Honda dealer.

Please find enclosed the signed extension and amending agreement for your lease with Honda Financial Services protected with the password you have provided.


Sincerely,


Honda Financial Services
Monday - Friday 8am-8pm EST

Please visit our owners website at www.myhonda.ca, click on myfinance to register and access your account online. If you require further assistance with registration, contact us at the number shown above.

________________________

This transmission (including attachments, if any) is confidential and may be privileged. It is intended only for the person(s) named above. Any other distribution, copying or disclosure whatsoever is STRICTLY PROHIBITED. If you have received this e-mail in error, please delete it and any attachments from your computer system and records.
